00055 #ifndef INDRI_INFERENCENETWORKBUILDER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_INFERENCENETWORKBUILDER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/QuerySpec.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/Repository.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/InferenceNetwork.hpp"
00061 #include "indri/ListCache.hpp"
00062 #include <map>
00063 #include <vector>
00064 
00065 class InferenceNetworkBuilder : public indri::lang::Walker {
00066 private:
00067   std::map< indri::lang::Node*, InferenceNetworkNode* > _nodeMap;
00068   InferenceNetwork* _network;
00069   Repository& _repository;
00070   ListCache& _cache;
00071   int _resultsRequested;
00072   
00073   template<typename _To, typename _From>
00074   std::vector<_To*> _translate( const std::vector<_From*>& children ) {
00075     std::vector<_To*> translation;
00076 
00077     for( unsigned int i=0; i<children.size(); i++ ) {
00078       translation.push_back( dynamic_cast<_To*>(_nodeMap[children[i]]) );  
00079     }
00080 
00081     return translation;
00082   }
00083 
00084   TermScoreFunction* _buildTermScoreFunction( const std::string& smoothing, UINT64 occurrences, UINT64 contextSize ) const;
00085 
00086 public:
00087   InferenceNetworkBuilder( Repository& repository, ListCache& cache, int resultsRequested );
00088   ~InferenceNetworkBuilder();
00089 
00090   InferenceNetwork* getNetwork();
00091 
00092   void defaultAfter( indri::lang::Node* node );
00093   void after( indri::lang::IndexTerm* term );
00094   void after( indri::lang::Field* field );
00095   void after( indri::lang::ExtentAnd* extentAnd );
00096   void after( indri::lang::ExtentOr* extentOr );
00097   void after( indri::lang::ExtentInside* extentInside );
00098   void after( indri::lang::ODNode* odNode );
00099   void after( indri::lang::UWNode* uwNode );
00100   void after( indri::lang::FilRejNode* uwNode );
00101   void after( indri::lang::FilReqNode* uwNode );
00102   void after( indri::lang::ContextCounterNode* contextCounterNode );
00103   void after( indri::lang::ScoreAccumulatorNode* scoreAccumulatorNode );
00104   void after( indri::lang::AnnotatorNode* annotatorNode );
00105   void after( indri::lang::TermFrequencyScorerNode* termScorerNode );
00106   void after( indri::lang::CachedFrequencyScorerNode* cachedScorerNode );
00107   void after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* rawScorerNode );
00108   void after( indri::lang::ExtentRestriction* erNode );
00109   void after( indri::lang::PriorNode* priorNode );
00110   void after( indri::lang::WeightNode* weightNode );
00111   void after( indri::lang::CombineNode* combineNode );
00112   void after( indri::lang::OrNode* orNode );
00113   void after( indri::lang::NotNode* notSpecNode );
00114   void after( indri::lang::MaxNode* maxNode );
00115   void after( indri::lang::WAndNode* wandNode );
00116   void after( indri::lang::WSumNode* wsumNode );
00117   void after( indri::lang::FieldLessNode* flNode );
00118   void after( indri::lang::FieldGreaterNode* fgNode );
00119   void after( indri::lang::FieldBetweenNode* fbNode );
00120   void after( indri::lang::FieldEqualsNode* fbNode );
00121   void after( indri::lang::FilterNode* filterNode );
00122 };
